data.text: Have you ever found some money in your pockets after not wearing a pair of pants for a while? Well if you book a nice holiday to Cyprus today with WIZZ for March next year, it's just gonna be the same little surprise, but so much better. Book now👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/wD5NuiOlxP
